name: Crazy Zombies - Zombie Land Free
description:
Very cool physics game and with 60 Free levels it's bigger and better than ever!

Zombie is here! In Zombie Land the rules are simple - Keep the zombie on the blocks, don't fall to the ground. Tap to destroy the blocks, reach the target number, yun can pass level. Note, there is a time limit. Enjoy!

Key Features:
1. Innovative physics gameplay.
2. Outstanding graphics.
3. Free keep update with new levels.

Full Version Features:
1. 3 themes, with 180 levels.
2. Game Center with 10 achievement.
3. And More.
